text: we were born from retail built for
retailers so we have this long pedigree
of working in the retail industry and
what we really try to do is allow those
retailers to innovate we want them to be
unlocked to be able to pursue different
ideas around the customer experience
that's kind of the Genesis behind AWS
the ability to take some of that
undifferentiated heavy lifting away from
people that are coming up with new
features and new ways to do retail and
cpg we put that in the cloud and make it
much easier to access we're very very
good at scalability availability
security all those things that are
really important in the cloud what I
like about this industry is that the
customer always changes uh the customer
is always in flux and wanting different
things at different times so we're
always trying to look around corners and
see what we think customers will want
next and help retailers deliver that a
lot of the technology that we've created
on the amazon.com side transitions over
to the AWS side so that we can bring
that to lots of different markets we
work with lots of different partners to
bring them to bear and where we don't
have partners that fill in certain use
cases we'll even look to create new
things on their behalf I love seeing a
Retailer's face when they say I didn't
know you could do that or I had never
thought about doing it that way when we
can bring A New Perspective to them
that's really what enables them to take
it to the next level and provide an even
better customer
[Music]
experience
